about_bio_en: I am an international student currently studying System Engineering at ECC Computer College in Osaka, Japan. With a strong multicultural background. I have practical experience in  Web Development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I am continuously building my skills to create responsive, user-friendly websites. I am also expanding my knowledge in Artificial Intelligence and modern software tools. Passionate about designing clean, effective digital experiences, I aim to contribute to innovative projects and grow as a creative and adaptable Web Developer.
